name: mm-scroll-panel
description: A scrollable content container with custom scrollbars - for use in instances where native scrollbars interfere with layout

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: The scope of the light DOM items added to any mm-scroll-panel (for the purpose of internally responding to DOM mutation)

methods.name: resetScroll
methods.description: A method which can be called to reset the scroll position to the top.

properties.name: scope
properties.description: The scope of the light DOM items added to any mm-scroll-panel (for the purpose of internally responding to DOM mutation)
